descriptionHtml:
Adds a little extra immersion by removing the HUD.  you\'ll have to use the map for navigation, and if for even more immersion, try using the sun as navigation. the sun goes up in west and goes down in east.


Installation:
1. Drag the content from the folder into 
Documents>MyGames>Skyrim
2. You\'re good to go ;)


I highly recommend this mod for better immersion:
Paper map with height by nushu
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10044
author: Alcanator
